definition: of the yellowish-beige color of buff leather, an implement consisting of soft material mounted on a block, to polish and make shiny
details:
adjective
- of the yellowish-beige color of buff leather
noun
- an implement consisting of soft material mounted on a block
= synonyms: buffer
- a medium to dark tan color
= synonyms: caramel, caramel brown, raw sienna
- bare skin
- an ardent follower and admirer
= synonyms: fan, lover, devotee
- a soft thick undyed leather from the skins of e.g. buffalo or oxen
verb
- to polish and make shiny
= example: to polish and make shiny
= synonyms: burnish, furbish
- to strike or beat repeatedly
= example: to strike or beat repeatedly
= synonyms: buffet
